EmailTemplate.name: Happy Birthday
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Birthday from {!C2N IT Service Private Limited }
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMPLOYEE (Srikanth)},
We just wanted to send you a Happy Birthday wish, from all of us at {!C2N IT Service Private Limited }.
May you celebrate it with those most meaningful to you,
Sincerely,
{!EMPLOYEE Owner}
